mapper.insert: INSERT INTO payment_info ( code, price, user_no, star_no, status ) VALUES ( #{code}, #{price}, #{user_no}, #{star_no}, #{status} )
mapper.select: SELECT pi.*, sb.status as star_status FROM payment_info pi JOIN star_board sb ON pi.status = sb.status AND pi.user_no = sb.user_no WHERE pi.user_no = #{user_no}
SELECT * FROM payment_info order by pay_no desc
